Carmelo Anthony and LeBron James were the headliners, but Allen Iverson and JR Josh Smith stole the show. Allen Iverson scored a season-high 37 points and Josh Smith added 29 to help the Denver Nuggets beat the Cleveland Cavaliers 122-100 on Monday night. They didn't steal my spotlight, said Carmelo Anthony , who had 22 points and nine rebounds.`` They did what they were supposed to do. They took advantage of the defense that they threw at us.'' Even Sergey Brin was in all praise for Eric Schmidt but also mentioned about his personal passions and new products saying, I'd like to mention that I've had a great time working with Larry now for 15 years and Eric Schmidt for a decade. Both of them have inspired and moved me. I would like to work more on my personal passions. There will be several new products I'm working on. I've been accused of vaporware recently, so I won't talk about them yet. But soon. There are many analysts who believe that Larry Pages lacks experience in the top CEO level. .'' In a short piece for Harvard Business Review, Eric Schmidt said Google's strategic initiatives are`` all about mobile.'' He said the company must focus on developing high-speed mobile networks that will usher in new and creative applications, mostly entertainment and social, for these phone platforms. 's not hosting Super party DALLAS-- NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell is not concerned about Michael Vick being billed as hosting a Super Bowl party because the Eagles quarterback told him it's not true. He has said that on numerous occasions people have been using his name about being involved in some type of a party and he had no intention of participating in that, Roger Goodell said. Iraq on the verge of all-out civil war, the Richard Nixon told Donald Rumsfeld he had to go.`` It was hard for him to do that- to come to that conclusion,'' said Donald Rumsfeld . And of course I felt the same way when I had to fire somebody. I didn't like it either. He said,` Are you OK with this?' And I said` Absolutely.' Packers ahead 7-0 on their way to a 21-14 victory.`` He's like a very good scorer in basketball_ you know he's going to get points,'' Steelers defensive coordinator Dick LeBeau said. From a defensive standpoint, you've got to keep him from controlling the game and monopolizing the game. That's what we have to try and do with Aaron Rodgers . He's a great player. He can create, improvise with his feet, go to his second and third choice in the route because he has such a quick release. The 6-foot-5, 241-pound Ben Roethlisberger isn't as speedy as Aaron Rodgers or Michael Vick nor as statuesque as Tom Brady and Peyton Manning ; he just makes it work. spark for Detroit after a slow start, winning his first game since joining the Pistons, 100-92 over the Sacramento Martin Luther King on Tuesday night.`` It was a huge lift off of me,'' Allen Iverson said. I knew it would happen. You think every game you go out and play it's going to happen. It feels good. I wanted to get the monkey off my back. I'm just excited that I got my first win and I can now try to get a lot more. Tayshaun Prince added 26 points and 11 rebounds for the Pistons, who had lost their first two games since acquiring Allen Iverson from Denver last week for All-Star point guard Chauncey Billups , key reserve Antonio McDyess and Cheikh Samb .
